text: 2.10: 2 Ko 1.6; Ef 3.13; Kor 1.24Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu won ndava havhargiap, gu zam mba simtɨgi ndi. Gu mba Fhe Bakɨme won mbuigi gumgi gu mbigi, gu mben kurkurarga. Gu vuzvugi, mbe vhɨra Krais Zisas taagiap mbe ndigirim, mbe ana han zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigip, mbe guigira nzerara ana phorgɨp zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga.
